changeSet.sql: IF NOT EXISTS ( SELECT * FROM sys.columns WHERE object_id = OBJECT_ID(N'[dbo].[Loja]') AND name = 'idRegiaoAdministrativa' ) BEGIN ALTER TABLE Loja ADD IDRegiaoAdministrativa INT NULL; END

rollback.sql: IF EXISTS ( SELECT * FROM sys.columns WHERE object_id = OBJECT_ID(N'[dbo].[Loja]') AND name = 'idRegiaoAdministrativa' ) BEGIN ALTER TABLE Loja DROP COLUMN IDRegiaoAdministrativa; END
